      Methods in learning.supervised that return types with arguments of type DiscreteClassifier 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static java.util.ArrayList<DiscreteClassifier> ClassifierFactory.getAllDiscClassifierInstances(int numCategories, CombinedMetric cmet, int k)

    • Uses of DiscreteClassifier in learning.supervised.methods.discrete

      Subclasses of DiscreteClassifier in learning.supervised.methods.discrete 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DNaiveBayes
      This class implements the standard Naive Bayes classifier.
      class  DOneRule
      This class implements the trivial One-rule classifier that learns a one-level decision tree.
      class  DWeightedNaiveBayes
      This method implements the weighted version of the Naive Bayes classifier, that supports arbitrary instance weights.
      class  DZeroRule
      This class implements the trivial zero-rule classifier.
      class  KNNNB
      This class implements the k-nearest neighbor Naive Bayes algorithm, KNNNB, that learns a Naive Bayes model on the restriction of the data on the kNN set.
      class  LWNB
      This class implements the locally-weighted Naive Bayes algorithm, LWNB, that learns a Naive Bayes model on the restriction of the data on the kNN set.
